docs.text:
Presentation.jl






Installation


(
v1
.
1
)
 
pkg
 
add
 
Presentation








Usage


using
 
Presentation


render
(
/path/to/filename.md
)






Use 
next()
 or 
previous()
 to move between slides.




Motivation


The motivation was to build a presentation tool that uses the text interface in a terminal.


Other similar tools:




mdp


patat


qov


vtmc
docs.title: Home

docs.text: using   Presentation  render ( /path/to/filename.md )   Use  next()  or  previous()  to move between slides.
docs.title: Usage

docs.text: The motivation was to build a presentation tool that uses the text interface in a terminal.  Other similar tools:   mdp  patat  qov  vtmc
docs.title: Motivation

docs.text:
Usage


To use 
Presentation.jl
 in Julia, first add it:


(
v1
.
1
)
 
add
 
Presentation






Then you can run the following:


julia
 
using
 
Presentation


julia
 
render
(
/path/to/file.md
)






You move through slides by using 
next()
 and 
previous()
.
docs.title: Usage

docs.text: To use  Presentation.jl  in Julia, first add it:  ( v1 . 1 )   add   Presentation   Then you can run the following:  julia   using   Presentation  julia   render ( /path/to/file.md )   You move through slides by using  next()  and  previous() .
